title: LF Mid, Top, Jg Plat+
body: Looking for 3 players that can play on weekends and most weekdays at night. Must have skype/teamspeak and be plat+

replies.body:
diamond 5 Mid lane main

got skype and teamspeak

add me if interested

I am usually on my smurf so also add demonsiayer

IGN: Plottel

Rank: Platinum 3

Role: Mid

Top 5 champs: Lissandra, Annie, Xerath, Orianna, Diana (Can learn any new champion as required by team)

Available Monday-Friday from 6pm AEST onwards and all day on Saturday and Sunday.

I have a working mic and all voice chat programs.

IGN: damosstorm

Rank: Platinum 4

Main: mid and jungle

Top 3 champs: Mid -> Viktor, Diana, Zed

Jungle meta change recently so I'm still finding the right ones to play

I can play on pretty much everyday, flexible hours. 

I have skype and Ts3 available with a mic.
